examples.title: HTTP Usage Template:
examples.content:
GET /status/<:jobId>  HTTP/1.1
Host: image-stage.adobe.io/lrService
Content-Type: application/json
authorization: Bearer $token
x-api-key: $x-api-key
x-gw-ims-org-id: $x-gw-ims-org-id

examples.title: Curl Usage:
examples.content: curl -H "authorization: Bearer $token" -H "content-type:application/json" -H "x-api-key:$x-api-key" -X GET https://image-stage.adobe.io/lrService/status/<:jobId>

examples.title: Pending Job Example:
Succeeded Job Example:
Failed Job Example:
Success-Response Templated:

Success 202.description:
the child job status

  • pending - request has been accepted and is waiting to start
  • running - the child job is running
  • uploading - files have been generated and are uploading to destination
  • succeeded - the child job has succeeded
  • failed - the child job has failed
include hrefs that client can use to track status
any error reported by the requested job
further descriptions of the exact error where errorDetail is substituted for a specific issue

Error 4xx.description: further descriptions of the exact error where errorDetail is substituted for a specific issue

title: post job
description: Initiates an asynchronous job to auto tone an image
name: auto_tone_post

examples.title: HTTP Usage Templated:
HTTP Example(CC Asset):
HTTP Example(External Asset):
Curl Usage:
examples.content: curl -H "authorization: Bearer $token" -H "Content-Type:application/json" -H "x-api-key:$x-api-key" -X POST -d '{"inputs":{"href":"<href>","storage":"<storage>"},"outputs":[{"href":"<href>","storage":"<storage>","type":"<type>"}]}' https://image-stage.adobe.io/lrService/autoTone

Request.description: A hash describing an input image to edit. The input object will be either 'external' OR 'adobe'
Either a Creative Cloud assets path for storage="adobe" OR a presignedGetURL
is the asset stored on Adobe's cloud or an external service (like AWS S3)
array of output objects
Either a Creative Cloud assets path for storage="adobe" OR a presignedPutURL
see the input.storage key.
outputs.type desired image format.
outputs.overwrite=true if the output file already exists should it be overwritten. Will eventually support eTags

Success 202.description: hrefs the client can use to get status of the asynchronous job

examples.title: Success-Response Templated:
Success-Response Example:

Error 4xx.description: further descriptions of the exact error where errorDetail is substituted for a specific issue

title: post job
description: Initiates an asynchronous job to apply a preset on an image
name: presets_post

Request.description: A hash describing an input image to edit and the presets to apply.
A hash describing an input image to edit. The input object will be either 'external' OR 'adobe'
Either a Creative Cloud assets path for storage="adobe" OR a presignedGetURL
is the asset stored on Adobe's cloud or an external service (like AWS S3)
An array describing the list of presets to apply. The preset objects will either be 'external' OR 'adobe'
Either a Creative Cloud assets path for storage="adobe" OR a presignedGetURL
is the asset stored on Adobe's cloud or an external service (like AWS S3)
array of output objects
Either a Creative Cloud assets path for storage="adobe" OR a presignedPutURL
see the input.storage key.
outputs.type desired image format.
outputs.overwrite=true if the output file already exists should it be overwritten. Will eventually support eTags
